translations: 用唐杜里烹饪法烧的；泥炉炭火烹饪法的
唐杜里烹饪法；泥炉炭火烹饪法

sentences.sentence: Marinade the chicken breasts in the tandoori paste.
sentences.translation: 把鸡胸脯肉放入唐杜里烧烤酱里腌泡。

sentences.sentence: Even more delicious was the juicy meat and rich flavor of the murgh tandoori .
sentences.translation: 更多美味多汁的印度烤鸡和别有风味的的泥炭火炉烤的印度鸡，能让闻者垂延三尺！

sentences.sentence: In the modern world, the "tandoori chicken tikka masala" became Britain's national dish!
sentences.translation: 在现代世界，“马萨拉烤鸡”成了英国的国菜！
